alert.note: Alert for Butler; Logan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 5:43PM EDT until July 07 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Logan County in south central Kentucky... Southwestern Butler County in south central Kentucky... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 443 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Dunmor to 9 miles east of Crofton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Logan and southwestern Butler Counties, including the following locations... Justice, Insco, Huntsville, Dimple, Spa, Epleys, Leetown, Wolf Lick, Everett and Crossroad. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
